title: Monica McNutt talks Knicks, a Cleveland return for LeBron James and Ben Simmons with the Nets
description:
Bomani Jones and Monica McNutt of ESPN and MSG fame discuss the Knicks and their return to mediocrity (1:42), the possibility that LeBron James would return to the Cavaliers for the twilight of his career (14:19) as well as whether or not Ben Simmons will find success with the Nets while they hurdle towards the postseason (28:03). Plus, her "meteoric" rise and All-Star weekend festivities!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
